setDiacritics() - Method in class model.Model
Private method setting the diacritics field, which is private and its type is Map(Character - diacritical mark, Integer - number of occurrence)
setFields(String) - Method in class model.Model
A public method setting private fields in this class by running setting methods of this class: splitSentence(), setNumberOfChars(), setNumberOfWords(), setPalindromes(), setLetters(), setDiacritics().

Parametrized test for checking correctness of assigning diacritical marks

Arguments for setFieldsTestDiacritics test

setLetters() - Method in class model.Model
Private method setting the letter field, which is private and its type is Map(Integer - number of letters, Integer - number of words with that many letters)
setNumberOfChars() - Method in class model.Model
Private method setting the numberOfChars field, which is private and its type is int.
setNumberOfWords() - Method in class model.Model
Private method setting the numberOfWords field, which is private and its type is int.
setPalindromes() - Method in class model.Model
Private method setting the palindromes field, which is private and it is a collection - its type is Map(String - palindrome, Integer - number of its occurrence in the text ).
setPrecision(double) - Method in class view.ResultServlet
Private method setting precision of given value to two decimal places.
setWords() - Method in class model.Model
Private method setting the words field, which is private, by running splitSentence method.
splitSentence() - Method in class model.Model
Private method setting the words field, which is private, by splitting the sentence using regex and stream.
string - Static variable in class model.Model
A private field holding string (text) given by user
